channel.title: Bio homework help
channel.description:
Are enzymes used up after they do their of hlep building a molecule or helping break down a molecule? explain.
Sucrose is also a disaccharide made up of two simple sugars, glucose and a fructose. whould lactaid if you put it into a sucrose solution? Explain.
Explain why enzymes are so important to living organisms
thanks! if you can help tank

item.title: Bio homework help
item.dc:creator: @Alex_Owns Alex Owns
item.description:
@Alex_Owns wrote:

Enzymes dont fuel our bodies…

They break down molecules, whether it be for digestion, or any other process. Unsure of the second, and the last one. Well the last one - Enzymes are important to us to help us eat food…which we need.

Read full topic
